org.deeplearning4j.util

Interface OptimizerMatrix

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StochasticHessianFree, VectorizedDeepLearningGradientAscent, VectorizedNonZeroStoppingConjugateGradient

    public interface OptimizerMatrix
    Optimizer that handles optimizing parameters. Handles line search and all the components involved with early stopping
